original_title: ONE on Prime Video 1: Moraes vs. Johnson II
overview: A ONE Flyweight World Championship rematch between current three-time champion Adriano Moraes and former UFC Flyweight Champion (also 2019 ONE Flyweight World Grand Prix Champion) Demetrious Johnson headlined the event. The pairing previously met at ONE on TNT 1 in April 2021 where Moraes defeated Johnson by KO in Round 2.
title: ONE on Prime Video 1: Moraes vs. Johnson II
